name: Dinja Klan Xtreme (Demo)
description:
Dinja Klan Xtreme is a 2d platformer involving the adventures off  brothers Kida and Kias. Solo mode follows adventure of Kida. In two player mode, the two brothers race to the girl of their dreams. While encountering enemy clans and rouge ninjas.

So put your ninja to the mask and get ready to go!
